oai_dc:dc.dc:title: McClung. Charles McClung.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pencil and charcoal(?) drawing of Charles McClung (1761-1835). (stained). 4.25 x 5.5”. Artifact 1982.001 Charles McClung was a surveyor, merchant and lawyer. He was born in Pennsylvania, the son of Matthew and Martha McClung. In 1790 he married Margaret White, the daughter of Knoxville founder James White.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Portrait drawings; Artifacts; Art;
